channel.title: kaelyn-racine on Cottenie Lab
channel.description: Recent content in kaelyn-racine on Cottenie Lab

item.description: I am a fourth year undergraduate student at the University of Guelph majoring in Zoology and minoring in Ecology. I am very passionate about global conservation, therefore upon graduation I hope to be able to pursue a career in wildlife rehabilitation or ecological conservation. I am working with Alicia Halhed and Dr. Karl Cottenie on a meta-analysis in microbial ecology to examine conceptual differences and similarities in current literature.
